item.text: The essential idea here is that we create a decentralised platform that uses the following combinations of technologies:

1. Scala based architecture
  2. A large open space is often chosen as a venue for efficient communication

story.text: The essential idea here is that we create a decentralised platform that uses the following combinations of technologies:

1. [[Standard Based P2P Architecture]]
  2. [[Smart Contract Governance]]
